citeinfo.origin: Alaska Department of Natural Resources (DNR), Division of Forestry
citeinfo.title: Timber Harvest - EVOS Database

descript.abstract: Data Type: Exxon Valdez Oil Spill; Past and Predicted (1993) timber harvest areas for selected throughout EVOS area delineated by Alaska Department of Natural Resources, Division of Forestry, and Alaska Department of Fish and Game title 16 permit process. These areas include eastern Prince William Sound, southern Montague Island, southern tip of Kenai Peninsula and Afognak Island. Predicted harvest areas are very general and indicate ongoing nature of industry filing of intent to harvest. On Afognak Island, ADNR, Division of Forestry has been working with KONCOR Native corporation to detail the harvest history. Intended use as a resource layer for use in damage assessment, and habitat restoration for the spill affected area.

distinfo.distliab: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.
